summary: **Monday Night Football (MNF)** is a popular NFL game broadcast on Monday nights. It started on ABC in 1970 and moved to ESPN in 2006. In 2020, it returned to ABC with some games also shown on ESPN. ESPN2 and ESPN+ offer extra features like the "Manningcast" and streaming options. MNF is very successful, especially with male viewers, and is watched worldwide on different channels and streaming platforms. It also ensures local fans can see their games, even if they don't have cable.
title: Monday Night Football
